skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: solar edge
des:
Solar Edge tells you your solar power and energy statistics from your SolarEdge system.

All skill invocations will give you your desired data and then will end the skill session.

This skill requires your SolarEdge site id and API key (you must have SolarEdge admin rights for your site).

Commands:

Alexa, open Solar Edge. (gives current solar power, current consumption, and daily solar energy)

Alexa, ask Solar Edge to send instructions. (you have to give email permission in the Alexa app)

Alexa, ask Solar Edge about my current power (gives current solar power)

Alexa, ask Solar Edge about my current load (gives current load power - only if you have the SolarEdge power meter)

Alexa, ask Solar Edge about my battery/storage (gives battery information - only if you have a SolarEdge battery and SolarEdge power meter)

Alexa, ask Solar Edge about my daily (monthly, yearly, lifetime) energy (gives requested solar energy)

Alexa, ask Solar Edge about my environmental benefits (gives saved CO2 and equivalent trees planted)

Alexa, ask Solar Edge about my stats (gives all statistics)

Alexa, ask Solar Edge when was the last update (returns last site data update)

Alexa, ask Solar Edge to reload my site (reloads the site particulars, only needed when the site timezone changes)

Alexa, ask Solar Edge to reset|remove access (resets|removes skill access to user’s solar; skill deletes site id and site access token)

Alexa, ask Solar Edge to send instructions (lists available commands)

Alexa, ask Solar Edge for help (lists available commands)

Initialization:

* When first using the Solar Edge skill, it will ask you for the site id and API key for whatever site you're monitoring. You generate your API key in the admin tab of your SolarEdge online account. If you don't see an admin tab, ask your installer for admin rights.

There are 2 ways to enter your site id and API key for the skill:

1) Go to the skill's data entry webpage and enter in your data. This is the easiest way!

https://voice2biz.com/solaredgedataentry

2) To enter the site id and API key from within the skill itself, you MUST use the Alexa App on your phone or tablet, and its KEYBOARD. If you don't see the Alexa keyboard icon in the Alexa App, you won't be able to use the skill. See our short YouTube video for a tutorial on how to enter them:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2zZAY2fRyPI

If your site id and API key don't seem to work, it might be because Alexa sometimes changes the data before it reaches the skill as it tries to interpret your input. 

If you have trouble with entering your data, please contact me at solaredgeskill@gmail.com

Note: This skill is NOT affiliated with SolarEdge Inc. (https://www.solaredge.com) The solar data is obtained from the SolarEdge API and requires the site id and API key of the target site.
